Description.Name: ComStar News Bureau
Description.Details: Battle of Lopez Over - Conquista Invaded The long battle in [[DM.SystemDefs[starsystemdef_Lopez],Lopez]] is drawing to a close after almost three months of heavy fighting. In space around [[DM.SystemDefs[starsystemdef_Conquista],Conquista]], a battle lasting nearly a week has concluded, with the FWLM aerospace forces emerging victorious. The [[DM.Factions[faction_MarikA6],6th Marik Militia]] has secured a beachhead on the planet, swiftly joined by the [[DM.Factions[faction_MarikA3],2nd Free Worlds Guards]] and the [[DM.Factions[faction_MarikC8],Atrean Hussars]].

Description.Name: ComStar News Bureau
Description.Details:
The Battle of Lopez proved to be a challenging endeavor for FWL forces, as their battlemech advantage was offset by a significant number of rebel tank and infantry forces supporting the defending [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreDefendersOfAndurien],6th Defenders of Andurien]].

The FWLM employed a maneuvering battle strategy, leveraging the inherent mobility of their battlemechs to counter the rebels' numerical superiority. Despite the intense fighting that nearly escalated into a pitched battle, which the FWLM aimed to avoid, luck favored the loyalists at every turn. Finally, after three months of combat and mounting losses, the 6th Defenders decided to initiate a retreat from the planet.

This concludes the CNB November broadcast.
